title: Thunderbolts
description:
Drew Prochaska, Marc Abbott and Sandi Marx tell stories about ninja stars, mother "fucks," and the secret charm of colostomy bags.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Hip Hop Instrumentals, Bruce Lee, Marc Abbott, Pretenders, Sandi Marx, The Derek Trucks Band, Jeff Barr, Drew Prochaska, kevin Allison)
